00010 
00011 class Body;
00012 class BodyPath;
00013 class SwarmHistory;
00014 class BodyPathCluster;
00015 
00016 enum GroupingMode {SPATIOTEMPORAL=0, SWARM=1};
00017 
00018 class ActivityModel : public Model
00019 {
00020     DECLARE_SERIAL(ActivityModel)
00021 public:
00022     // --------------- Persistant variables -----------------------
00023     bool m_initialized;
00024 
00025     // commmon activity recognition parameters
00026     int    m_mode;                    // one of two different grouping modes:
00027     int    m_minGroupingEvents;       // Minimum number of swarming events to be accounted as a group
00028     double m_minGroupingDuration;     // Minimum duration (sec) of swarming to count as a swarming event
00029 
00030     // for SPATIOTEMPORAL model
00031     double m_groupsDistanceThreshold; // max distance in (cm) to be a part of the same group
00032     int    m_groupsMaturePath;        // min number of (seconds) in a path to consider it for grouping 
00033     int    m_groupsTimeDelta;         // time interval +/- to consider the distances at      
00034     int    m_groupsTimeStep;          // skip every ... step within the m_groupsTimeDelta
00035 
00036     // for SWARM model
00037     double m_separationWeight;        // Separation: steer to avoid crowding other local flock-mates
00038     double m_alignmentWeight;         // Alignment: steer towards the average heading of the local flock-mates
00039     double m_cohesionWeight;          // Cohesion: steer to move toward the average position of local flock-mates
00040     double m_maxGroupRadius;          // Maximum distance (cm) from the center of the group to be considered a part of the group
00041     double m_minCollisionRadius;      // Minimum distance (cm) to another body to avoid collision
00042     
00043     double m_fitnessPositionWeight;   // How important is position error?
00044     double m_fitnessOrientationWeight;// How important is orientation error?
00045     double m_fitnessScatterWeight;    // How important is intra-group scatter?
00046     double m_fitnessThreshold;        // Body score to be a member of a group
00047 
00048     double m_SalesRepHistThreshold;
00049     int m_pathSmoothSigma; 
00050     int m_dwellTime;       
00051     double m_dwellAreaRadius; // in centimeters
00052     LABHistogram2D m_salesRepHist;
00053     CArray<int> m_salesRepID; // the ID's used in learning only; current sales reps are estimated at a run time
00054 
00055     ActivityModel(void);
00056     bool Initialize();
00057     void DeInitialize();
00058     bool IsInitialized() { return m_initialized; };
00059     virtual ~ActivityModel(void);
00060 
00061     BodyPath* FindBodyMatch(int id);
00062     BodyPath* FindBodyMatch(Body* b);
00063     BodyPathCluster* FindCluster(int groupid);
00064 
00065     void UpdateSalesRepHist();
00066     void DrawSalesReps(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color);
00067     void DrawDwellingBodies(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color);
00068     void DrawMap(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color, double scale=1);
00069     void DrawPath(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color=CV_RGB(0,0,0));
00070     
00071     void GetClusterDistances(CArray<BodyPathCluster*> &c, CvMat* d);
00072     void GetPathDistances(CvMat* d);
00073     void ClusterGroups();
00074 };
